name: Splinter (itch)
description:
• Right Trigger to smash.
  • Left trigger to rebuild.
  • Left Grab trigger to move object or fragments.
  • Break rocks or cubes by punching them

If you do not have a VR equipment, you can watch the whole gameplay here:

All the assets were taken from Unity Asset Store and the sound effects from freesound.org

  • https://freesound.org/people/Breviceps/sounds/448080/
  • https://freesound.org/people/grunz/sounds/109663/

  • https://freesound.org/people/lurpsis/sounds/444136/
